description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy demonstrates the ability to use Gear Third repeatedly and for extended periods without the shrinking side effect that plagued him pre-timeskip. He unleashes a sustained barrage of giant fist attacks on Noah.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses repeated Elephant Gatling attacks to destroy Noah and save Fish-Man Island, showing his mastery of Gear Third after two years of training.

strengths.description: Post-timeskip, Luffy no longer experiences the shrinking side effect after using Gear Third, allowing him to use it continuously in battle without vulnerability.
